name: Purpose
text:
SERVICES TO ADULTS
 
Cross References
 
  Inspections of state-licensed care facilities; public notice, see §321-1.8.
 
Law Journals and Reviews
 
  Long-Term Care in Hawaii.  18 HBJ, no. 13, at 59 (2015).
 
         The purpose of this part is to establish the nature and type of services to elders, disabled, and aged who are qualified to receive social services according to standards and conditions prescribed by the department of health. [L 2012, c 93, pt of §2]
